Comment.Language: The icon of the Resurrection is prepared for the Resurrection procession, while the people chant the following hymns:

Text.Language: Kata ni,oroc e~]cwtem e~rwou: w~nim nai cumvwnia eyn/ou e~namasj.
All the choirs that I hear, O what are these symphonies that are coming to my ears
كل الصفوف التي اسمعها ياللاتفاقات الآتية إلي أذني.
Pi,~rictoc aftwnf e~bol qen n/eymwout: n~swrp m~v~ouai n~te nicabbaton.
Christ rose from the dead early on the first day of the week.
المسيح قام من بين الأموات باكر أحد السبوت.
Nimatoi m~per je meynouj: qa t~a~nactacic m~pencwt/r: qen pie~hoou n~te ]kuriak/.
O soldiers lie not about the Resurrection of our Savior on the Lord’s Day.
أيها الجند لا تكذبوا نحو قيامة مخلصنا في يوم الأحد.

Comment.Language: The Hymn “All you heavenly orders” is chanted before the re-enactment of the Lord’s Resurrection takes place:
